revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Ruins of Hope |image = [[File:Ruins of Hope.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Ruins of Hope. |tokens = 1,200,000 |location = Northeast of Poni Breaker Coast }}
'''Ruins of Hope''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 121 tiles arranged in a 11x11 square, including 11 chest tiles, 41 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 16,435,490 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !!
